resources.string: A Foodie by nature and a developer by passion, a wannapreneur, tech enthusiast, [open source contributor] (https://github.com/dev5151), [tech blogger] (https://medium.com/@devaansh51) and a mentor for those who want to learn exciting new Technologies. I started off with Android Development, did some DataScience and currently i am thinking of exploring DevOps. I love attending hackathons and hacking solutions that can contribute to development of society. I am always open for new Projects Ideas. I love meeting new people and learning from their experiences.
